name: part_004
file: tmp_【#SSholoX】世界征服に向けて…【3Dアジトお披露目】 [aGp1Q3aH_Bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Celebrating Chloe's correct guess of 'whisk' and concluding her turn.
Transitioning to La+ Darknesss's turn and putting on her blindfold.
La+ Darknesss tries to guess the object in the box, which is a pacifier.
Preparing for Hakui Koyori's turn and blindfolding her.
Hakui Koyori guesses the object, which is mayonnaise, using her intuition.
Preparing for Kazama Iroha's turn and blindfolding her.

subtitles.original: あ！答えは...！
subtitles.english: Oh! The answer is...!

subtitles.original: 泡だて器！泡だて器！
subtitles.english: A whisk! A whisk!

subtitles.original: あ、泡だて器！
subtitles.english: Ah, a whisk!

subtitles.original: 正解です！泡だて器！
subtitles.english: Correct! A whisk!

subtitles.original: もう、答え出てたから...！
subtitles.english: The answer was already out there...!

subtitles.original: 茹でたから... かき混ぜるやつって言ってた。
subtitles.english: I said 'the thing you stir with' because I boiled it.

subtitles.original: よかった！
subtitles.english: Thank goodness!

subtitles.original: 今度はちょろ... ちょろいな...
subtitles.english: This time it's easy... so easy...

subtitles.original: 意外になんとかなるでござるな。
subtitles.english: It surprisingly works out somehow, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だったね。
subtitles.english: It was fine, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: いつもいる人だからね。
subtitles.english: Because she's someone who's always here.

subtitles.original: わんこ... 吾輩だったらわかんないかも...
subtitles.english: A dog... If it was me, I might not have known...

subtitles.original: 泡だて器が出てこない...
subtitles.english: The word 'whisk' wouldn't come to mind...

subtitles.original: 動いてなくなさそうだったから大丈夫かなと思って、ガッてやったら大丈夫だったね。
subtitles.english: It didn't seem like it was moving, so I thought it would be fine, and when I went for it, it was okay.

subtitles.original: 20秒めちゃくちゃ短いから。短いね。
subtitles.english: 20 seconds is extremely short. - It is short.

subtitles.original: 次ラプラスちゃんやってみる？
subtitles.english: Want to try next, La+-chan?

subtitles.original: ラプラスやってみましょうか。吾輩こういうの得意だからな。
subtitles.english: Shall we have La+ try? - I'm good at this sort of thing.

subtitles.original: 本当に？じゃあ目隠し付けてあげるよ。
subtitles.english: Really? Then I'll put the blindfold on you.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: はい、ラプラスちゃん目隠し付けましょうね〜
subtitles.english: Okay, let's put the blindfold on La+-chan~

subtitles.original: あーっ！
subtitles.english: Ahhh!

subtitles.original: どうしたどうした？
subtitles.english: What happened, what happened?

subtitles.original: ちょっと今耳に息が...！
subtitles.english: Your breath was just in my ear...!

subtitles.original: 何やってんだよ！
subtitles.english: What are you doing!

subtitles.original: ナイス、こよりちゃん。
subtitles.english: Nice one, Koyori-chan.

subtitles.original: 目隠しって言ったらね、誘導しないと。
subtitles.english: When we say blindfold, we have to guide her.

subtitles.original: ここだよ、ここだよ。
subtitles.english: It's here, it's here.

subtitles.original: お、これは... 絵面すごい...
subtitles.english: Oh, this... the visual is amazing...

subtitles.original: 入れるものは... こちらですよ！
subtitles.english: The thing we're putting in... is this!

subtitles.original: はい、ラプラスの入れ物に入ってるのはこちら！
subtitles.english: Yes, what's in La+'s box is this!

subtitles.original: これ！わかりますか？
subtitles.english: This! Do you know what it is?

subtitles.original: やばそう！やばい！
subtitles.english: That looks bad! Crazy!

subtitles.original: でもなんかラプラスにぴったり。まあね、確かに。
subtitles.english: But somehow it's perfect for La+. - Well, true enough.

subtitles.original: このまま持って帰っていいよって言いたい感じのね、プレゼントかな？
subtitles.english: I feel like telling her she can take it home just like this, like a present?

subtitles.original: 20秒で当ててもらいましょう！はい、スタート！
subtitles.english: Let's have her guess it in 20 seconds! Okay, start!

subtitles.original: 余裕だよ、これは。
subtitles.english: This is a breeze.

subtitles.original: どこ？お、え、何だこれは？
subtitles.english: Where? Oh, eh, what is this?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？ちょっと... 結構小さいからね。
subtitles.english: Are you okay? It's quite small.

subtitles.original: あ！わかった！わかった！
subtitles.english: Ah! I got it! I got it!

subtitles.original: わかった？
subtitles.english: You got it?

subtitles.original: これ、え、言っていいの？いつも使ってるもんね。
subtitles.english: This, can you say it? You use it all the time, right?

subtitles.original: おしゃぶり！
subtitles.english: A pacifier!

subtitles.original: おおーっ！速っ！
subtitles.english: Whoa! That was fast!

subtitles.original: 正解 おしゃぶり
subtitles.english: Correct: Pacifier

subtitles.original: ちょろ！いつも使ってるもんね。
subtitles.english: Easy! Since I use it all the time.

subtitles.original: いつも使ってるもんねってちょっとヒントだったかもしれない。
subtitles.english: Maybe 'you use it all the time' was a bit of a hint.

subtitles.original: いつも使ってるタイプのやつ？
subtitles.english: Is it the type you always use?

subtitles.original: うわ、本当だ！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it really is!

subtitles.original: なるほどね。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: 結構正解してるね。我々の能力あるんじゃん？
subtitles.english: We're getting a lot of them right. Maybe we have talent?

subtitles.original: じゃあ次はこより行ってみる？
subtitles.english: Then, shall we have Koyori go next?

subtitles.original: はい、行きます！自信のほどは？
subtitles.english: Yes, I'll go! How's your confidence?

subtitles.original: でも今まで来てるからね、どんどんと。こよりも頭脳ですから、やっちゃいますよ！
subtitles.english: Well, we've been on a roll. Koyori is a brain too, so I'll do it!

subtitles.original: やっちゃえやっちゃえ！
subtitles.english: Do it, do it!

subtitles.original: じゃあ目隠しは風真が付けるでござる。
subtitles.english: Then Kazama will put the blindfold on.

subtitles.original: お願いします！え、ちょっとエッチなんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Please! Eh, isn't this a bit lewd?

subtitles.original: どこで見ようとしてるんだよ。
subtitles.english: Where are you trying to look from?

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと！何も見てないから！何も見てないから！
subtitles.english: Wait! I'm not looking at anything! I'm not looking at anything!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、何もしませんから！
subtitles.english: It's okay, I won't do anything!

subtitles.original: 何もしてないでござるよ！
subtitles.english: I'm not doing anything!

subtitles.original: じゃあこよりに触ってもらうのはこちら！
subtitles.english: Then, what Koyori will touch is this!

subtitles.original: お、どこどこ？
subtitles.english: Oh, where, where?

subtitles.original: ああ、でもこれは当ててほしいかな。
subtitles.english: Ah, but I'd like her to guess this one.

subtitles.original: 博士さすがに... ああ、これね！
subtitles.english: As expected of the Doctor... Ah, this!

subtitles.original: はい、はい、はい。ありがとうありがとう。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes. Thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: じゃあ制限時間20秒で行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Then, let's go with a 20-second time limit!

subtitles.original: こよりのチャレンジ、スタート！
subtitles.english: Koyori's challenge, start!

subtitles.original: 触らないで一回推理で言うけど、マヨネーズだと思う。
subtitles.english: I'll say it based on reasoning without touching first, but I think it's mayonnaise.

subtitles.original: ええーっ！？そんなまさか！
subtitles.english: Eeeh!? No way!

subtitles.original: へ？違う？ケチャップ？崖の... マヨネーズじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Eh? No? Ketchup? A cliff... it's not mayonnaise?

subtitles.original: 博士さすが！
subtitles.english: As expected of the Doctor!

subtitles.original: なんでみんなの言葉でわかっちゃうんだよ！
subtitles.english: How can you tell just from everyone's words!

subtitles.original: 博士マジ？しかしケチャップの可能性もある。
subtitles.english: Doctor, seriously? But there's also the possibility of ketchup.

subtitles.original: しかしね、そうでござるな。
subtitles.english: However, that's true.

subtitles.original: が、マヨネーズ！
subtitles.english: But, mayonnaise!

subtitles.original: はい、正解です！
subtitles.english: Yes, that's correct!

subtitles.original: 正解 マヨネーズ
subtitles.english: Correct: Mayonnaise

subtitles.original: さすが！なんで推理したくなっちゃうんだろう... 頭脳だから。
subtitles.english: As expected! I wonder why I want to deduce... because I'm a brain.

subtitles.original: やはり頭脳ということでござるな。やってるね。
subtitles.english: It means you're indeed a brain. You're on it.

subtitles.original: じゃあ次はいろは行ってみようか。
subtitles.english: Then, let's have Iroha go next.

subtitles.original: はい！じゃあ吾輩が付けてあげるよ。
subtitles.english: Yes! Then I'll put it on you.

subtitles.original: 本当に？届くでござるか？なめてんぬ？
subtitles.english: Really? Can you reach? Are you underestimating me?

subtitles.original: やぁーっ！
subtitles.english: Yaaah!

subtitles.original: やりたい放題じゃん！わかったよ、はい、しゃがんでください。
subtitles.english: You're just doing whatever you want! I get it, okay, please crouch down.

subtitles.original: ああーっ！
subtitles.english: Ahhh!

subtitles.original: はい、目隠ししました！
subtitles.english: Okay, blindfold is on!

subtitles.original: なんでわかるの？
subtitles.english: How can you tell?

subtitles.original: なんか感覚... みんなのいる感覚がすごいな...
subtitles.english: Somehow the feeling... the feeling of everyone being there is amazing...

subtitles.original: ではいろはに当ててもらうものはこちら！
subtitles.english: Then, the thing for Iroha to guess is this!

subtitles.original: なんだろう？なに？
subtitles.english: What is it? What?
